700941f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Silver Street
700941f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., north side, between Silver Street and Haight Ave., showing the Westchester Methodist Episcopal Church (the low
structure in the center).
August 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
700941f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Silver Street, Bronx, NY

700942f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Silver Street
700942f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., east side, south from its junction with Silver
Street (extreme left).
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
